verses.verse: וּלְאַחְאָ֛ב <S%H256><s%> And Ahab שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> had seventy בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons בְּשֹׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> in Samaria וַיִּכְתֹּב֩ <S%H3789><s%> wrote יֵה֨וּא <S%H3058><s%> And Jehu סְפָרִ֜ים <S%H5612><s%> letters וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> and sent שֹׁמְר֗וֹן <S%H8111><s%> to Samaria אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> unto the rulers יִזְרְעֶאל֙ <S%H3157><s%> of Jezreel הַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <S%H2205><s%> to the elders וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הָאֹמְנִ֥ים <S%H539><s%> and to them that brought up אַחְאָ֖ב <S%H256><s%> Ahab's לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> [children] saying

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now כְּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> cometh הַסֵּ֤פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Now as soon as this letter הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about וְאִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> for בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H113><s%> to you seeing your master's וְאִתְּכֶם֙ <S%H854><s%> for הָרֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> [are] with you and [there are] with you chariots וְהַסּוּסִ֔ים <S%H5483><s%> and horses וְעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> city מִבְצָ֖ר <S%H4013><s%> a fenced וְהַנָּֽשֶׁק׃ <S%H5402><s%> also and armour

וּרְאִיתֶ֞ם <S%H7200><s%> Look even out הַטּ֤וֹב <S%H2896><s%> the best וְהַיָּשָׁר֙ <S%H3477><s%> and meetest מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H113><s%> of your master's וְשַׂמְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7760><s%> and set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> throne אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> [him] on his father's וְהִֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <S%H3898><s%> and fight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אֲדֹנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H113><s%> for your master's

וַיִּֽרְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> afraid מְאֹ֣ד <S%H3966><s%> greatly מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> greatly וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> Behold two הַמְּלָכִ֔ים <S%H4428><s%> kings לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not עָמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> stood לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> not before וְאֵ֖יךְ <S%H349><s%> how נַעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> him how then shall we stand אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H587><s%> we

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> [of the children] sent אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> And he that [was] over the house וַאֲשֶׁ֪ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָעִ֟יר <S%H5892><s%> and he that [was] over the city וְהַזְּקֵנִים֩ <S%H2205><s%> the elders וְהָאֹמְנִ֨ים <S%H539><s%> also and the bringers up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יֵה֤וּא ׀ <S%H3058><s%> to Jehu לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> saying עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H5650><s%> We [are] thy servants אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we וְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who תֹּאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> all that thou shalt bid אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H413><s%> to us נַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> and will do לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> we will not נַמְלִ֣יךְ <S%H4427><s%> king אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> us we will not make any הַטּ֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> thou [that which is] good בְּעֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thine eyes עֲשֵֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> do

וַיִּכְתֹּ֣ב <S%H3789><s%> Then he wrote אֲלֵיהֶם֩ <S%H413><s%> about סֵ֨פֶר ׀ <S%H5612><s%> a letter שֵׁנִ֜ית <S%H8145><s%> the second time לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> to them saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לִ֨י אַתֶּ֜ם <S%H859><s%> you וּלְקֹלִ֣י ׀ <S%H6963><s%> unto my voice אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> and you שֹׁמְעִ֗ים <S%H8085><s%> If ye [be] mine and [if] ye will hearken קְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָאשֵׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> ye the heads אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> persons בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H113><s%> your master's וּבֹ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> and come אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> about כָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> this time מָחָ֖ר <S%H4279><s%> by to morrow יִזְרְעֶ֑אלָה <S%H3157><s%> to me to Jezreel וּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> sons הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> Now the king's שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> [being] seventy אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> persons אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with גְּדֹלֵ֥י <S%H1419><s%> [were] with the great men הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city מְגַדְּלִ֥ים <S%H1431><s%> which brought them up אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> came הַסֵּ֙פֶר֙ <S%H5612><s%> And it came to pass when the letter אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> to them that they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's וַֽיִּשְׁחֲט֖וּ <S%H7819><s%> and slew שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> persons וַיָּשִׂ֤ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָֽאשֵׁיהֶם֙ <S%H7218><s%> their heads בַּדּוּדִ֔ים <S%H1731><s%> in baskets וַיִּשְׁלְח֥וּ <S%H7971><s%> and sent אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to יִזְרְעֶֽאלָה׃ <S%H3157><s%> him [them] to Jezreel

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> And there came הַמַּלְאָךְ֙ <S%H4397><s%> a messenger וַיַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> and told ל֣וֹ לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> him saying הֵבִ֖יאוּ <S%H935><s%> They have brought רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> the heads בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said שִׂ֣ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> Lay אֹתָ֞ם <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֧י <S%H8147><s%> ye them in two צִבֻּרִ֛ים <S%H6652><s%> heaps פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the entering in הַשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> until the morning

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> And it came to pass in the morning וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> that he went out וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> to all the people צַדִּקִ֖ים <S%H6662><s%> Ye [be] righteous אַתֶּ֑ם <S%H859><s%> you הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אֲנִ֜י <S%H589><s%> I קָשַׁ֤רְתִּי <S%H7194><s%> behold I conspired עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אֲדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> against my master וָאֶהְרְגֵ֔הוּ <S%H2026><s%> and slew וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> who הִכָּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> him but who slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> another

דְּע֣וּ <S%H3045><s%> Know אֵפ֗וֹא <S%H645><s%> now כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> nothing יִפֹּ֜ל <S%H5307><s%> that there shall fall מִדְּבַ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> nothing of the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> unto the earth אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> concerning the house אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab וַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> hath done אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what דִּבֶּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> [that] which he spake בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> by עַבְדּ֥וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H452><s%> Elijah

וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> slew יֵה֗וּא <S%H3058><s%> So Jehu אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֤ים <S%H7604><s%> all that remained לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house אַחְאָב֙ <S%H256><s%> of Ahab בְּיִזְרְעֶ֔אל <S%H3157><s%> in Jezreel וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all גְּדֹלָ֖יו <S%H1419><s%> and all his great men וּמְיֻדָּעָ֣יו <S%H3045><s%> and his kinsfolks וְכֹהֲנָ֑יו <S%H3548><s%> and his priests עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בִּלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> without הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <S%H7604><s%> until he left ל֖וֹ שָׂרִֽיד׃ <S%H8300><s%> him none remaining

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> And he arose וַיָּבֹ֔א <S%H935><s%> and departed וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> to Samaria ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> court עֵ֥קֶד <S%H7462><s%> [And] as he [was] at the shearing הָרֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> of the shepherds בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> in the way

וְיֵה֗וּא <S%H3058><s%> Jehu מָצָא֙ <S%H4672><s%> met אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחֵי֙ <S%H251><s%> with the brethren אֲחַזְיָ֣הוּ <S%H274><s%> of Ahaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who אַתֶּ֑ם <S%H859><s%> and they וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> Who [are] ye? And they answered אֲחֵ֤י <S%H251><s%> We [are] the brethren אֲחַזְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H274><s%> of Ahaziah אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we וַנֵּ֛רֶד <S%H3381><s%> and we go down לִשְׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> to salute בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and the children הַגְּבִירָֽה׃ <S%H1377><s%> of the queen

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said תִּפְשׂ֣וּם <S%H8610><s%> Take חַיִּ֔ים <S%H2416><s%> them alive וַֽיִּתְפְּשׂ֖וּם <S%H8610><s%> And they took חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> them alive וַֽיִּשְׁחָט֞וּם <S%H7819><s%> and slew אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at בּ֣וֹר <S%H953><s%> them at the pit בֵּֽית־ עֵ֗קֶד <S%H1044><s%> of the shearing house אַרְבָּעִ֤ים <S%H705><s%> and forty וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> [even] two אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and he הִשְׁאִ֥יר <S%H7604><s%> neither left אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he any מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like ס

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> had departed מִשָּׁ֡ם <S%H8033><s%> there וַיִּמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> thence he lighted אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹנָדָב֩ <S%H3082><s%> on Jehonadab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רֵכָ֨ב <S%H7394><s%> of Rechab לִקְרָאת֜וֹ <S%H7125><s%> [coming] to meet וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֗הוּ <S%H1288><s%> him and he saluted וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> to him הֲיֵ֧שׁ <S%H3426><s%> to him Is אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבָבְךָ֣ <S%H3824><s%> thine heart יָשָׁ֗ר <S%H3477><s%> right כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> my לְבָבִי֙ <S%H3824><s%> as my heart עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> to him לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <S%H3824><s%> is your heart וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered יְהוֹנָדָ֥ב <S%H3082><s%> Jehonadab יֵ֛שׁ <S%H3426><s%> It is וָיֵ֖שׁ <S%H3426><s%> it תְּנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> If it be give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> [me] thine hand וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> And he gave יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> [him] his hand וַיַּעֲלֵ֥הוּ <S%H5927><s%> and he took him up אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּרְכָּבָֽה׃ <S%H4818><s%> to him into the chariot
